headline: Join the Lonkind Beta
tagline: Be among the first to experience a new way to connect and create with AI.
feature_1_desc: Discover and connect with new people from around the world.
feature_2_desc: High-quality audio and video calls to talk face-to-face.
feature_3_desc: Upload and share photos, videos, and text with your network.
sign_in_desc: Sign in to access your world.
sign_up_desc: Join the community. It's free and only takes a minute.
